tool_description: Logs individual reading progress entries with validation and timestamp recording for accurate tracking.

book_title.description: Title of the book being read

pages_read.description: Number of pages read in this session

minutes_read.description: Minutes spent reading in this session

session_date.description: Date and time of the reading session

chapter_completed.description: Whether a chapter was completed in this session

book_completed.description: Whether the entire book was completed in this session

error_messages: Missing book_title: Book title is required and cannot be empty
Invalid session_date: Must be a valid date-time string in ISO 8601 format
Invalid pages_read: Must be a non-negative integer
Invalid minutes_read: Must be a non-negative integer
No progress recorded: At least one of pages_read or minutes_read must be greater than 0
usage: Provide book_title and session_date as required fields. Include pages_read, minutes_read, chapter_completed, or book_completed to record specific progress metrics for the session.

entry_id.description: Unique identifier for the logged entry

session_summary.description: Summary of the reading session progress

total_progress.description: Cumulative progress score for the session
